title: Behold Esports looking for Assistant Manager / Manager
body:
Behold Esports is an upcoming League of Legends organisation.
Being apart of Behold Esports means you will be working alongside me and helping to run our currently two i2g teams which we are looking to expand as we continue to grow.

- Must have good communication skills
- Experience is not necessary but understanding the tournament scene is
- Be very active in helping sort scrims and being in communication with various people 
- Most of all be able to have fun with the lads

Add me on discord if you are interested or want more information 
- Havoc#4859
